sourcesContent:
import {ListItemText, TextField} from "@material-ui/core"
import IconButton from "@material-ui/core/IconButton"
import DeleteIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Delete"
import Dialog from "@material-ui/core/Dialog"
import DialogTitle from "@material-ui/core/DialogTitle"
import DialogContent from "@material-ui/core/DialogContent"
import DialogActions from "@material-ui/core/DialogActions"
import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"
import ListItem from "@material-ui/core/ListItem"
import * as React from "react"
import {deleteTodoById, updateTodo} from "../api/requests"
import { useConfirm } from "material-ui-confirm"
import {ITodo} from "../types/type.todo"
import TableCell from "@material-ui/core/TableCell"

type Props =  {
  rowData: any,
  itemKey: number,
  onDelete: (id: string) => void
}

export const SelectedRow: React.FC<Props> = ({rowData, onDelete}) => {

  const confirm = useConfirm();

  const handleConfirmation = (id: string) => {

    confirm({ description: 'This action is permanent!' })
    .then(() =>  deleteTodoById(id))
    .then(id => onDelete(id))
    .then(() => setDialogState(false))
    .catch((err: Error) => console.log(err))

  }

  const handleUpdate = (todo: ITodo) => {

    confirm({ description: 'This action is permanent!' })
    .then(() =>  updateTodo(todo))
    .then(id => onDelete(id))
    .then(() => setDialogState(false))
    .catch((err: Error) => console.log(err))


  }

  const handleClose = () => {
    setDialogState(false);
  };

  return (
        <Dialog
            open={dialogState}
            onClose={handleClose}
            aria-labelledby="form-dialog-title"
        >
          <DialogTitle id="form-dialog-title">Update</DialogTitle>
          <DialogContent>
            <TextField
                defaultValue={todo.text}
                autoFocus
                margin="dense"
                id="name"
                fullWidth
            />
          </DialogContent>
          <DialogActions>
            <Button color="primary" onClick={handleClose}>
              Cancel
            </Button>
            <Button color="primary" onClick={() => handleUpdate(todo)}>
              Update
            </Button>
          </DialogActions>
        </Dialog>

  )
}
